name: UNITED STATES ASSOCIATION OF REPTILE KEEPERS
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the pet trade; Concerns over Lacy Act amendments in USICA.
Issues related to the pet trade; Concerns over Lacy Act amendments in USICA.

Oppose amendments to the Lacey Act which restricts the rights of pet owners to move freely in interstate commerce and across state lines; oppose amendments that unduly restrict import or export. Speci
Educate staff and members on exotic pet industry and issues of concern involving possession, transport and import/export.
